column1: Smoque BBQ////I had the sliced beef brisket sandwich.  The beef brisket had very little flavor.  It did have a small smoke ring around it
column2: but the smoke flavor and rub never saturated the beef.  It also was fatty (fat makes me gag
column4: which should be 2.5.)  The BBQ sauce was thin and didn't have much flavor.  The meat was sliced thicker than I'm used to
column5: but was very tender and falling apart.  I think the fat made it juicy.  So if you like fat
